show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #14, Hoy Family "Regenerative Ranching From Horseback"
subtitle: #14, Hoy Family "Regenerative Ranching From Horseback"
summary:
CK and I talked to the Hoy Family, winners of the 2020 Kansas Aldo Leopold Conservation Award about their ranch, their cows and their management.
As a special extra, on release day, I was with the Hoy family, learning Regenerative Ranching from Horseback.
Check them out on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/FlyingWRanch/

https://www.facebook.com/FlyingWRanchGFB/
